cells.data:
-- dropWhileEnd :: (a -> Bool) -> [a] -> [a]
-- dropWhileEnd :: (Char -> Bool) -> String -> String
on dropWhileEnd(p, xs)
    set i to length of xs
    tell mReturn(p)
        repeat while i > 0 and |Î»|(item i of xs)
            set i to i - 1
        end repeat
    end tell
    take(i, xs)
end dropWhileEnd
